match:
Missing\ `ChatCompletionAssistantMessageParam\.content`!\
A\ ChatCompletionAssistantMessageParam\ contains\ the\ following\ tool_calls:\ \[\{'id':\ 'call_62136354',\ 'type':\ 'function',\ 'function':\ \{'arguments':\ '\{"order_id":\ "order_12345"\}',\ 'name':\ 'get_delivery_date'\}\}\]\.\
Using\ tool_calls\ with\ a\ ChatCompletionAssistantMessageParam\ requires\ a\ non\-empty\ ChatCompletionAssistantMessageParam\.content\ field\.\
Please\ use\ the\ output\ ChatCompletionAssistantMessage\ directly\ as\ the\ input\ ChatCompletionAssistantMessageParam!\
Usually\ this\ is\ an\ error\ when\ the\ ChatCompletionAssistantMessageParam\ is\ manually\ constructed\ and\ the\ content\ field\ in\ the\ previous\ ChatCompletion\ is\ not\ copied\ over\ correctly\.
